query.name: WS_Stats
query.query:
SELECT
  name,
  value.value
FROM
  security_analysis.account_info
where
  category = 'Workspace Stats'
  and run_id = (
    select
      max(runID)
    from
      security_analysis.run_number_table
  )
ORDER BY name

widgets.text:
# Network Security
* NPIP  
* BYOVPC 
* VPC Peering 
* IP Access Lists

# Identity & Access
* SSO
* SCIM
* RBAC
* Token Management

# Compliance
* Cluster Policy
* Audit Logs
* Global Init Script
* Mounts

# Data Protection
* Secrets Management
* Cluster Encryption
* BYOK
* S3 Encryption

query.name: Category Pillars
query.query: SELECT check as Check, BP.severity as Severity, score as Status, chk_date as RunDate, concat( '', BP.recommendation, '' ) as Recommendation, CASE WHEN BP.severity = 'High' THEN 3 WHEN BP.severity = 'Medium' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END as ord FROM ( SELECT chk_name, score, chk_date FROM security_analysis.security_checks where run_id = ( select max(runID) from security_analysis.run_number_table ) ) SC, security_analysis.security_best_practices BP WHERE SC.chk_name = BP.chk_name and BP.category = {{category}} ORDER BY Status DESC, ord DESC

query.name: Category Counters
query.query:
SELECT
  count(*) as counter
FROM
  security_analysis.security_checks sc,
  security_analysis.security_best_practices sbp
where
  sc.chk_name = sbp.chk_name
  and sbp.severity = {{severity}}
  and sc.score = 1
  and sbp.category = {{category}}
  and run_id = (
    select
      max(runID)
    from
      security_analysis.run_number_table
  )

query.query: SELECT check as Check, BP.severity as Severity, score as Status, chk_date as RunDate, concat( '', BP.recommendation, '' ) as Recommendation, CASE WHEN BP.severity = 'High' THEN 3 WHEN BP.severity = 'Medium' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END as ord FROM ( SELECT chk_name, score, chk_date FROM security_analysis.security_checks where run_id = ( select max(runID) from security_analysis.run_number_table ) ) SC, security_analysis.security_best_practices BP WHERE SC.chk_name = BP.chk_name and BP.category = {{category}} ORDER BY Status DESC, ord DESC

query.name: Category Pillars
query.query: SELECT check as Check, BP.severity as Severity, score as Status, chk_date as RunDate, concat( '', BP.recommendation, '' ) as Recommendation, CASE WHEN BP.severity = 'High' THEN 3 WHEN BP.severity = 'Medium' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END as ord FROM ( SELECT chk_name, score, chk_date FROM security_analysis.security_checks where run_id = ( select max(runID) from security_analysis.run_number_table ) ) SC, security_analysis.security_best_practices BP WHERE SC.chk_name = BP.chk_name and BP.category = {{category}} ORDER BY Status DESC, ord DESC

title.text: Count of Violation Checks by Severity

query.name: SummaryStats
query.query:
SELECT
  sbp.category,
  sbp.severity,
  count(sbp.severity) severity_count,
  CASE
    WHEN sbp.severity = 'High' THEN 3
    WHEN sbp.severity = 'Medium' THEN 2
    ELSE 1
  END as ord
FROM
  security_analysis.security_checks sc,
  security_analysis.security_best_practices sbp
where
  score = 1
  and sc.chk_name = sbp.chk_name
  and run_id = (
    select
      max(runID)
    from
      security_analysis.run_number_table
  )
  and category not IN ('Workspace Settings', 'Workspace Stats')
group by
  sbp.category,
  sbp.severity
ORDER BY
  ord

query.name: Category Pillars
query.query: SELECT check as Check, BP.severity as Severity, score as Status, chk_date as RunDate, concat( '', BP.recommendation, '' ) as Recommendation, CASE WHEN BP.severity = 'High' THEN 3 WHEN BP.severity = 'Medium' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END as ord FROM ( SELECT chk_name, score, chk_date FROM security_analysis.security_checks where run_id = ( select max(runID) from security_analysis.run_number_table ) ) SC, security_analysis.security_best_practices BP WHERE SC.chk_name = BP.chk_name and BP.category = {{category}} ORDER BY Status DESC, ord DESC

query_draft.draft_text:
SELECT
  name,
  value.value
FROM
  security_analysis.account_info
where
  category = 'Workspace Stats'
  and run_id = (
    select
      max(runID)
    from
      security_analysis.run_number_table
  )
ORDER BY name
query_draft.original_query_text:
SELECT
  name,
  value.value,
  max(check_time)
FROM
  security_analysis.account_info
where
  category = 'Workspace Stats'
  and run_id = (
    select
      max(runID)
    from
      security_analysis.run_number_table
  )
GROUP BY
  name,
  value.value,
  category

SELECT

query_draft.draft_text:
SELECT
  sbp.category,
  sbp.severity,
  count(sbp.severity) severity_count,
  CASE
    WHEN sbp.severity = 'High' THEN 3
    WHEN sbp.severity = 'Medium' THEN 2
    ELSE 1
  END as ord
FROM
  security_analysis.security_checks sc,
  security_analysis.security_best_practices sbp
where
  score = 1
  and sc.chk_name = sbp.chk_name
  and run_id = (
    select
      max(runID)
    from

query_draft.original_query_text:
SELECT sbp.category, sbp.severity , count(sbp.severity) severity_count,
CASE WHEN sbp.severity='High' THEN 3 WHEN sbp.severity='Medium' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END as ord
FROM security_analysis.security_checks sc, security_analysis.security_best_practices sbp
where score = 1 and sc.chk_name = sbp.chk_name 
and run_id = (select max(runID) from security_analysis.run_number_table)
and category not IN ('Workspace Settings','Workspace Stats')
group by sbp.category,sbp.severity 
ORDER BY ord
